data.title: 35 popular male Australian actors you should know today
data.meta_description: Who are the most popular male Australian actors? Check out this article to know more about the top 35 best personalities you should know and watch today.
data.text:
Australia has a vibrant film and TV industry, with many good movies and TV shows coming from the oceanic country. It has many actors, with some of the biggest names in top industries like Hollywood coming from Aussieland. So, who are some of these popular male Australian actors?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Popular 10 male Australian actors

1. Chris Hemsworth

2. Simon Baker

3. Sam Worthington

4. Liam Hemsworth

5. Hugh Jackman

6. Jacob Elordi

7. Ryan Christian Kwanten

8. Luke Mitchell

9. Alex O’Loughlin

10. Russell Crowe

11. Alex Russel

12. Jai Courtney

13. Sullivan Stapleton

14. Travis Fimmel

15. Lincoln Lewis

16. Luke Hemsworth

17. Eric Bana

18. Dacre Montgomery

19. Devon Terrell

20. Xavier Samuel

21. Joel Edgerton

22. Ben Mendelsohn

23. Guy Pearce

24. Geoffrey Rush

25. Hunter Page-Lochard

26. Hugo Weaving

27. Richard Roxburgh

28. Mel Gibson

29. David Wenham

30. Anthony LaPaglia

31. Jonathan LaPaglia

32. Jack Thompson

33. Matt Day

34. Vince Colosimo

35. Bryan Brown

Who is the Australian actor in Hollywood?

Who is the Sudanese Australian actor?

Who is the most followed Australian celebrity on Instagram?

Male Australian actors are globally recognized because of their ability to deliver a broad range of performances in different accents. For this reason, their solid presence has been and continues to be felt in British and American films and TV shows.

Popular 10 male Australian actors

NoNamePlace of birth1Chris HemsworthMelbourne, Australia2Simon BakerLaunceston, Australia3Sam WorthingtonGodalming, United Kingdom4Liam HemsworthMelbourne, Victoria, Australia5Hugh JackmanSydney, New South Wales, Australia6Jacob ElordiBrisbane, Australia7Ryan Christian KwantenSydney, New South Wales, Australia8Luke MitchellGold Coast, Queensland, Australia9Alex O’LoughlinCanberra, Australia10Russell CroweWellington, New Zealand

Australia is home to some of the best personalities in the film industry. Their striking performances make them stand out from the rest. Here are some of the most famous actors from Australia in the world:

1. Chris Hemsworth

Full name: Christopher Hemsworth

Date of birth: 11 August 1983

Age: 40 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Australia

Chris Hemsworth is one of Hollywood's top Australian male actors. He is best known for playing the role of Thor in Marvel Cinematic Universe Movies.

Besides playing the role of Thor in Marvel, Chris Hemsworth has appeared in several other Hollywood movies such as Star Trek, Extraction, Snow White and the Huntsman, Red Dawn and Rush. He is also famous for his appearance in the Australian TV show Home and Away.

2. Simon Baker

Full name: Simon Lucas Baker

Date of birth: 30 July 1969

Age: 55 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Launceston, Australia

Simon Lucas Baker is another famous Aussie actor. He was born in Launceston, Tasmania, but grew up in several places, including South Wales and Sydney. He started his acting career in Australia, appearing in several TV shows such as Home and Away, E Street, and Heat Break High.

He then moved to the United States, appearing in several American films and TV shows. Simon Baker is mainly famous for playing the character of Patrick Jane in the CBS TV show, The Mentalist.

3. Sam Worthington

Full name: Samuel Henry John Worthington

Date of birth: 2 August 1976

Age: 47 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Godalming, United Kingdom

Sam Worthington is among the Australian actors in Hollywood. He is famous for his role in the Avatar movie franchise, where he played the role of Jake Sully. He has also appeared in several other films and TV shows, such as Clash of the Titans, Wrath of the Titans, Manhunt: Unabomber, Fractured and Under the Banner of Heaven.

Worthington is of English ancestry and was born in Surrey, South East England. However, when he was a child, his family moved to Perth, Australia, and he grew up in the Oceanic country. Sam Worthington got his start as an actor in the Aussie film and TV industry but later relocated to the US when he started landing bigger roles.

4. Liam Hemsworth

Full name: Liam Hemsworth

Date of birth: 13 January 1990

Age: 34 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Liam Hemsworth is another top Australian actor and the younger brother of Chris Hemsworth. He is famous for playing the role of Gale Hawthorne in The Hunger Games Film franchise. Liam Hemsworth has also appeared in several other films and TV shows, such as Independence Day: Resurgence, The Last Song and The Elephant Princes.

5. Hugh Jackman

Full name: Hugh Michael Jackman

Date of birth: 12 October 1968

Age: 55 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

Hugh Jackman is one of the most famous male Australian actors, best known for portraying the character of Logan/Wolverine in the X-Men film franchise. Hugh Jackman is known for several other films and TV shows, such as Rise of the Guardians, Bad Education, The Prestige, Van Helsing, Top Gear and Koala Man.

6. Jacob Elordi

Full name: Jacob Elordi

Date of birth: 26 June 1997

Age: 27 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Brisbane, Australia

Jacob Elordi is famous for portraying the role of Nate Jacobs in the hit HBO TV show, Euphoria. He has appeared in films such as Deep Water, 2 Hearts and The Mortuary Collection.

He started his acting career in the Australian film industry his debut role being the Aussie film, The Swinging Safari. Jacob Elordi then moved to Hollywood, with his first American role being the 2018 film The Kissing Booth.

7. Ryan Christian Kwanten

Full name: Ryan Christian Kwanten

Date of birth: 28 November 1976

Age: 47 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

Ryan Kwanten is a famous Australian actor and producer best known for portraying Jason Stackhouse in the television series True Blood. Ryan Kwanten started his acting career by appearing in several Australian television series such as Spellbinder, A Country Practice and Home and Away.

8. Luke Mitchell

Full name: Luke Mitchell

Date of birth: 17 April 1985

Age: 39 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia

Luke Mitchell is another one of the top male celebrities in Australia. He is an Aussie actor and model, best known for playing Lincoln Campbell on Marvel's Cinematic Universe TV show, Agents of SHIELD. Luke Mitchel is also known for appearing in the Australian soaps Neighbours and Home and Away.

9. Alex O’Loughlin

Full name: Alex O'Loughlin

Date of birth: 24 August 1976

Age: 47 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Canberra, Australia

Alex O'Loughlin is an Australian actor, director, writer and producer. He is best known for his role in the CBS TV show Hawaii Five-0, where he played Steve McGarrett. Alex O'Loughlin got into the mainstream Australian film and TV industry before moving and settling in the US to further his career.

10. Russell Crowe

Full name: Russell Ira Crowe

Date of birth: 7 April 1964

Age: 60 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Wellington, New Zealand

Russell Crowe is a New Zealand-born Australian actor. He is mostly famous for his role in the historical film, Gladiator, where he played General Maximus Decimus, Meridius. Russell Crowe spent most of his childhood in Australia, permanently moving there when he was 21.

11. Alex Russel

Full name: Alexander Andrew Russell

Date of birth: 11 December 1987

Age: 36 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Brisbane, Australia

Alex Russel is another one of the top famous Australian actors to watch out for in 2024. He is mostly famous for his role in the CBS television series SWAT, portraying Jim Street. Alex Russel then entered the Australian film industry, where he starred in a few minor roles, before moving to the US for more acting opportunities.

12. Jai Courtney

Full name: Jai Stephen Courtney

Date of birth: 15 March 1986

Age: 38 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Sydney, Australia

Jai Courtney is another male Australian actor who is doing well in Hollywood. He started his acting career with minor roles in the Australian film industry, mostly short films. Jai Courtney moved to the USA, where he landed roles in movies and TV shows such as Jack Reacher, Divergent, Insurgent, The Terminal List and Kaleidoscope.

13. Sullivan Stapleton

Full name: Sullivan Stapleton

Date of birth: 14 June 1977

Age: 47 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Sullivan Stapleton is another of the top actors from Australia who are thriving in the American entertainment industry. He transitioned to acting roles in theatre, films, and commercial ads, before joining the Australian film industry with his 1994 debut role, Baby Bath Massacre. Since then, Sullivan Stapleton has been featured in several films and TV shows mostly American.

14. Travis Fimmel

Full name: Travis Fimmel

Date of birth: 15 July 1979

Age: 45 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Echuca, Australia

Travis Fimmel is an Australian model and actor. He is famous for portraying Ragnar Lothbrok in the TV show Vikings. Travis Fimmel also appeared in several other films and TV shows, such as Chase, Raised by Wolves, Zone 44 and One Way.

15. Lincoln Lewis

Full name: Lincoln Clay Lewis

Date of birth: 24 October 1987

Age: 36 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Brisbane, Australia

Lincoln Lewis is an Australian actor who is best known for the film, Tomorrow, When the Way Began. He has also appeared in the Aussie TV shows Home and Away and Slide.

He started acting at 13, appearing in minor roles in various Australian teen TV shows. In 2007, Lincoln Lewis landed a role on Home and Away, which helped put his name on the map.

16. Luke Hemsworth

Full name: Luke Hemsworth

Date of birth: 5 November 1980

Age: 43 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Australia

Luke Hemsworth is famous for his role in the TV series Neighbours. He has appeared in films such as All Saints, Satisfaction, Blue Heelers and Westworld. Luke Hemsworth is the eldest of the Hemsworth brothers.

17. Eric Bana

Full name: Eric Martin Andrew Banadinović

Date of birth: 9 August 1968

Age: 55 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Eric Bana is an Australian actor and comedian famous for the sketch comedy series Full Frontal. He has appeared in films such as Blueback, The Finest Hours, The Dry and Back to the Outback. Eric Bana's breakthrough came in 2003 when he was featured as Bruce Banner in Hulk.

18. Dacre Montgomery

Full name: Dacre Kayd Montgomery-Harvey

Date of birth: 22 November 1994

Age: 29 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Perth, Western Australia, Australia

Dacre Montgomery is an Australian actor best known for his role as Billy Hargrove in the Netflix series Stranger Things. He has appeared in films such as Betrand the Terrible, Godot's Clinic, Tryptophan and The Broken Hearts Gallery. Dacre Montgomery began acting at a young age and has trained extensively in theatre and film.

19. Devon Terrell

Full name: Devon Terrell

Date of birth: 23 October 1992

Age: 31 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Long Beach, California, United States

Devon is famous for his role as a young Barack Obama in the biographical film Barry. He has appeared in films such as Cursed, Ophelia, It's What's Inside, and Bury Me When I'm Dead. Devon Terrell is among the young Australian actors.

20. Xavier Samuel

Full name: Xavier Samuel

Date of birth: 10 December 1983

Age: 40 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Hamilton, Australia

Xavier became famous for his role as Riley Biers in the 2010 film The Twilight Saga: Eclipse. He has appeared in films such as Anonymous, Blonde, Fury, and Love & Friendship. Xavier Samuel has won four awards.

21. Joel Edgerton

Full name: Joel Edgerton

Date of birth: 23 June 1974

Age: 50 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Blacktown, New South Wales, Australia

Joel is famous for appearing in two seasons of the Australian drama series The Secret Life of Us as Will McGill. He has appeared in films such as Warrior, Zero Dark Thirty, The Great Gatsby and The Boys in the Boat. Joel Edgerton has won 24 different awards.

22. Ben Mendelsohn

Full name: Paul Benjamin Mendelsohn

Date of birth: 3 April 1969

Age: 55 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Ben Mendelsohn is among the Australian actors in Hollywood. He became famous after appearing in the crime drama Animal Kingdom. Ben Mendelsohn has appeared in films such as Freaky Tales, The King, To Catch a Killer and Cyrano.

23. Guy Pearce

Full name: Guy Edward Pearce

Date of birth: 5 October 1967

Age: 56 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Ely, Cambridgeshire, England

Guy began acting in 1985 when he was featured as Mike Young in the Australian television series Neighbours. He has appeared in films such as Hunting, Dating the Enemy, A Slipping-Down Life and Traitor. Guy Pearce is the executive producer for the American horror film The Seventh Day.

24. Geoffrey Rush

Full name: Geoffrey Roy Rush

Date of birth: 6 July 1951

Age: 73 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Toowoomba, Queensland, Australia

Geoffrey Rush is an Australian actors male with over 50 years. He began his professional acting career with the Queensland Theatre Company in 1971. Geoffrey Rush has appeared in films such as Storm Boy, Gods of Egypt, Minions and Deception.

25. Hunter Page-Lochard

Full name: Hunter Djali Yumunu Page-Lochard

Date of birth: 4 July 1993

Age: 31 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

Hunter Page-Lochard is among the black Australian actors in the entertainment industry. His first role was in 2009 as D.C. Terry Ayyar in the film The Diplomat. Hunter Page-Lochard Has appeared in films such as Summer Coda, Twenty 7, Sleeping Dogs and Black Site.

26. Hugo Weaving

Full name: Hugo Wallace Weaving

Date of birth: 4 April 1960

Age: 64 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Ibadan, British Nigeria

He has been featured in films such as Hacksaw Ridge, V for Vendetta and The Lord of the Rings. Hugo Weaving has been involved with organizations such as the Australian Conservation Foundation and the Climate Council.

27. Richard Roxburgh

Full name: Richard Roxburgh

Date of birth: 23 January 1962

Age: 62 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Albury, New South Wales, Australia

Richard Roxburgh is famous for his role as Proud in the film The Riddle of the Stinson. He has appeared in films such as Elvis, Lovestruck, Go Karts and Angel of Mine. Richard Roxburgh is the writer and producer of the television series Rake.

28. Mel Gibson

Full name: Mel Columcille Gerard Gibson

Date of birth: 3 January 1956

Age: 68 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Peekskill, New York, United States

Mel Gibson is a renowned actor, director, and producer known for his significant contributions to the film industry. He has been featured in films such as Hacksaw Ridge, Signs, The Patriot and Gallipoli. Mel Gibson has directed and produced films such as Braveheart, Apocalypto and Flight Risk.

29. David Wenham

Full name: David Wenham

Date of birth: 21 September 1965

Age: 58 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Marrickville, New South Wales, Australia

David Wenham is famous for his role as Faramir in The Lord of the Rings. He has been featured in films such as The Boys, The Furnace, Van Helsing and Lion. David Wenham has won 17 different awards.

30. Anthony LaPaglia

Full name: Anthony LaPaglia

Date of birth: 31 January 1959

Age: 65 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Adelaide, South Australia

Anthony is an Australian producer, scriptwriter and actor. He is famous for his role in the drama film Lantana. Anthony LaPaglia has been featured in films such as Nitram, Pearl, Below and Holding the Man.

31. Jonathan LaPaglia

Full name: Jonathan LaPaglia

Date of birth: 31 August 1969

Age: 54 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Adelaide, South Australia, Australia

Jonathan is among the Australian actors male in Hollywood. He has been featured in films such as Lines, Pioneer, The Reckoning and The Secrets of Emily Blair. Jonathan LaPaglia won 2012 The Equity Ensemble Awards and the 2014 Silent River Film Festival, US.

32. Jack Thompson

Full name: John Hadley Pain

Date of birth: 31 August 1940

Age: 83 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Manly, New South Wales, Australia

Jack Thompson is one of the country's most iconic actors in the entertainment industry. He has been featured in films such as Sunday Too Far Away, Star Wars: Episode II – Attack of the Clones, The Sum of Us and Australia. Jack Thompson is the executive producer of Feed, High Ground and Around the Black.

33. Matt Day

Full name: Matthew Day

Date of birth: 28 September 1971

Age: 52 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Australia

Matt Day is one of the most handsome Australian actors. He got his first role at the age of 14 when he was featured in the ABC television series c/o The Bartons. Matt Day has appeared in television series such as Love Child, Wolf Creek, Black Comedy and The Other Guy.

34. Vince Colosimo

Full name: Vincenzo Colosimo

Date of birth: 11 November 1966

Age: 57 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Vince Colosimo has appeared in a variety of roles across different genres. He has appeared in films such as Moving Out, Street Hero, Chopper and The Hard Word. Vince Colosimo was the associate producer of The Kings of Mykonos.

35. Bryan Brown

Full name: Bryan Neathway Brown

Date of birth: 23 June 1947

Age: 77 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Panania, Australia

Bryan Brown has been on screen since the late 1970s. He has appeared in films such as Anyone But You, Palm Beach, Peter Rabbit, Red Dog: True Blue and The Light Between Oceans. Bryan Brown has won 12 different awards.

Who is the Australian actor in Hollywood?

Several Australian actors have made a significant impact in Hollywood. Some of the famous actors in Hollywood are Hugh Jackman, Nicole Kidman, Cate Blanchett and Heath Ledger.

Who is the Sudanese Australian actor?

Andrew Luri is a Sudanese-Australian actor who debuted in the drama Hearts and Bones. His performance earned him a nomination for an AACTA Award.

Who is the most followed Australian celebrity on Instagram?

Chris Hemsworth is the most-followed Australian on Instagram, with 59.3 million views.

The above are some of the top Australian actors. Some of these actors are top talent in Hollywood and the American TV industry. Their on-screen characters usually come with very realistic American accents, making it hard to figure out that they are Australian.

Tuko.co.ke published a detailed list of top young male actors under 30 you should watch. Due to more acting roles being available, there has been an increase in A-list young male actors under 30.

Some actors start acting before their 10th birthday, while most get their first roles in their 20s. Each of them has a unique drive, talent and charm that captivates their audience.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
